report.p:
From reading the cover letter, the writer wants to apply a game programming job in Filament Games. The cover letter shows that the writer had met most of the requirement and would fit well for the job position. The rhetorical situation is appropriate for the cover letter and the whole cover letter looks well organized and clear. I think the writer did well in demonstrate the school, work and personal experience in the background paragraph. After reading the job description, I can see that the writer really fits the position well. The word-level is pretty good since the person who will read the cover letter is an expert of all those computer engineering works. The question from her self-review about the , I think it fits the element meaning, I used the element in the same way. I don’t think the writer needs to add anything to the background but I think she can add something to make the reader feel that she really wants the job and did the research on the company at the beginning of the cover letter or at the end of it. Also, the writer can add some other skills such as communication skills which can show she would be a good in team working. Other than the content in the cover letter, I think some of the schema are not used.
